scripts.clean: yarn clean_native_builds && yarn clean_react_native && yarn clean_node_modules
scripts.clean_react_native: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && lsof -n -i4TCP:8081 | sed '1 d' | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
scripts.clean_node_modules: rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn cache clean && yarn
